Gold.en: Whips up a tornado to attack.

Silver.en: Whips up a tornado to attack.

Crystal.en: Whips up a tornado to attack.

Ruby.en: Whips up a vicious twister to tear at the foe.

Sapphire.en: Whips up a vicious twister to tear at the foe.

Emerald.en: Whips up a vicious twister to tear at the foe.

FireRed.en: A vicious twister attacks the foe. It may make the foe flinch.

LeafGreen.en: A vicious twister attacks the foe. It may make the foe flinch.

Diamond.en: The user whips up a vicious twister to tear at the foe. It may also make the foe flinch.
Diamond.de: Trifft Gegner mit heftigem Wirbelsturm. Gegner schreckt eventuell zurück.
